title: Spiritual Vaccine Summit
cleaned_text: Feel Confident During Uncertain Times P.L.A.Y.—Prosper, Laugh, and Amaze Yourself—to Thrive! Spiritual Vaccine Summit: Mastering our ability to play October 17 - 21, 2020 (online) Let's care for human body and Earth body together! Are you ready to invite positive energy (confidence and vibrancy) into your body, mind, soul, and wallet? During this new moon weekend, bring your aches and pains, unfinished projects, and unspoken dreams to the Spiritual Vaccine Summit to create a beginning that comes to fruition. Through the eyes, bodies, and voices of the Sedona SuperTeam, you can feel Mother Earth's magnificence and then elevate to higher levels of consciousness and peak performance. You are significant—a wonderful human conduit of divine energy flowing between sky and earth. Yes, we need Mother Earth's sunshine, fresh air, clean water, and mineral-rich soil for our physical, mental, spiritual, and financial health. And Mother Earth needs us, too. We must attain a higher level of consciousness to support her healing and regeneration in so many ways. Get ready, everyone! Put on your comfy clothes and bring your warm-hot water and a notebook for five fantastic days of "live broadcast" workshops on the Red Rocks of Sedona and dynamic duo playshops (recorded). We are deepening connections among all parts of ourselves and to Mother Earth.
